dcterms:description: A specific dataset designed for the RGB-D background matting task, containing 12 indoor scenes, with each scene involving 100 pure background RGB-D images and 5 RGB-D images with foreground objects for testing. Only the alpha matte on the test images is manually labeled for algorithm evaluation, and the labels are strictly unseen during training.
dcterms:title: JXNU RGBD Background Matting

dcterms:creator: K. Shen
C. Guo
M. Kaufmann
J. J. Zarate
J. Valentin
J. Song
O. Hilliges
dcterms:description: A dataset used for training the DART model, providing rendered RGB-D samples combined with background RGB-D images.
dcterms:title: X-Humans
